snippet: The Macgregor Transformation Model proposes to decrease Defense Department’s spending without leaving the armed forces less-than-ready for combat — a problem with other downsizing plans.
abstract: The Macgregor Transformation Model proposes to decrease Defense Department’s spending without leaving the armed forces less-than-ready for combat — a problem with other downsizing plans.

headline.main: A Plan for a More Powerful Military That Costs Less
